alert.note: Alert for Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:58PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Herkimer County through 645 PM EDT... At 558 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Waterville, or 9 miles southwest of New Hartford, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ilion, Herkimer, Little Falls, Mohawk, Frankfort, Dolgeville, West Winfield, Middleville, Jordanville, Cedarville, Fairfield, Elizabethtown, Warren, Ingham Mills, Jersalem Hill, West Frankfort, Spinnerville, Corrado Corners, Cedar Lake and Countryman. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 29A and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for eastern New York.
